mapper.select: SELECT ut.tests_id AS testId, ut.test_time AS testTime, ua.ans_time AS answerTime, ua.ans_number AS answerNumber, ut.user_id AS userId, ans.questions_id AS questionsId, q.*, FALSE AS option1Value, FALSE AS option2Value, FALSE AS option3Value, FALSE AS option3Value, FALSE AS option4Value FROM usertests ut INNER JOIN answers ans ON ut.tests_id = ans.tests_id INNER JOIN questions q ON ans.questions_id = q.questions_id left JOIN useranswer ua ON ua.questions_id = ans.questions_id WHERE ut.test_status = 0 AND ut.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into answers(answers_id,tests_id,questions_id) SELECT null,ts.tests_id,qs.questions_id FROM tests ts inner join questions qs where ts.tests_id= #{testsId}
